text: amazon Web Services has a long-standing
approach to pricing designed to meet
customer needs AWS cloud services are
priced differently from traditional
software and hardware A utility based
model where you pay only for what you
consume with no long-term contracts or
commitments Our pricing philosophy is
driven by a virtuous cycle AWS's
valuebased prices reduce the barrier to
entry into the cloud This in return
means more customers who drive more AWS
usage More AWS usage drives greater
infrastructure growth and innovation
which gives AWS significant economies of
scale thereby lowering infrastructure
cost and allowing AWS to pass savings
and continued innovation to customers
Amazon Web Services pricing provides
four fundamental benefits Pay as you go
You pay only for the services you need
and only for as long as you need them
Reduce costs AWS helps you reduce large
upfront costs such as facilities and
hardware Optimize planning With a
services model you can plan for and
efficiently change capacity requirements
With AWS you have multiple purchasing
options You can pay on demand for
services as you use them You can reserve
capacity through a prepayment model
called reserved instances You can
acquire short-term services through the
spot market when spare EC2 capacity is
available Pay in local
currencies You can eliminate global and
regional pricing complexities Along with
these benefits Amazon Web Services has
three key pricing principles to help you
save money Pay as you go Pay only for
the services you need with no long-term
contracts or
commitments Pay less per unit by using
more Pay less per unit as your
organization
grows Pay less when you reserve Save by
investing in reserved capacity reducing
prices by up to 75% for services like
EC2 and
RDS Amazon Web Services pricing is based
on three fundamental
components Compute you pay for compute
and processing power by the hour Storage
you pay per gigabyte
data transfer You pay per gigabyte for
data out and there are no charges for
incoming
data With AWS you can not only save
money but also have the flexibility to
pay for services in a way that best
meets your needs
To learn more about Amazon Web Services
pricing and get started today please
visit aws.mamazon.com/pricing
